page.shortlink: UX Properties Date picker day names
page.description: Specify the names of the days of the week to be shown when the pop-up date picker is used. This first entry in list must be Sunday (even if you set the 'first day of the week' property to another day. Enter a comma separated list. TIP: You can also set the day names in this special session variable: session._protected_datePickerDayNames.
